case.state: I’m here to inspire the world with magic!
I'm here! I made it! I only got a little lost.
Huh? Lotte, who was this? I thought I told you about the game...?
Yay! I was told this’d be a great place to show off some magic for an interested audience!
Yay! This’ll be fun!
Oh, you're here too, Professor Croix? That's kind of weird, I haven't seen you in forever!
Well, anyway, let's have fun!
Yay, another witch! Raven, you are a witch, right?
Sheena, you're dressed in purple and are going to use magic? Did you graduate from Luna Nova too?
Oh, Lotte, did I take a wrong turn on the leyline? I thought we were going to be playing strip poker tonight?
Yay! It's so nice to see all of you! But who's this ~player~ person?
Wow! There's so many mages and witches and sorcerers and demons and spirits and spellcasters and enchanters and... we're all so magic tonight!
Oh wow! So many monsters tonight. I think you'll love my performance!
Oh! I'm going to be playing a show for the fairies tonight, that's great!
Hm... I dunno if you can, Sayaka, I'm pretty good at numbers. And I'm the only witch here, so...
I've got my Shiny Rod, Sayaka. Don't worry, I'll keep you safe and entertained! No need to get slicy slicy stabby stabby over it.
Oh! Lots of other witches tonight! This'll be super fun! I bet you've never seen a show like mine!
Yay! ~cards~!
Well, that last hand was fine, but gimme ~cards~ this time!
Perfect! Just ~cards~!
Okay okay okay! I got this! ~cards~!
Oh, crap! ~cards~ or this’ll get bad!
Hummm… ~cards~?
Ha! Time for the best hand ever, ~cards~!
Gimme ~cards~!
Ew! ~cards~ that aren’t sticky! Please!
Metamorphie… how do you transform ~cards~? Oh! Right! Metamorphie papiesse!
Metamorphie… how do you transform ~cards~?
Haha! Yay!
Yay! Not as good as a Chariot limited card, but still a great hand!
Uwwwh... I'm still hungry. Are you sure there's no snacks here besides drinks?
Hmm… what would Chariot do…?
Hmmm…! This is pretty good!
Awwwh, can I use a spell to change these…? No…? Grumble...
Who would want these?! These are like that juice that gives you frog legs!
Uwaaaaah! Come on!
Adventures!? I love those! I've had to do all kinds of stuff. I recently played a show in Australia! Everything was kind of upside-down though, so I did my set in reverse order.
Hm... as long as it doesn't cause another big rocket, Professor, I trust you not to do bad guy stuff?
Professor, is it still okay if we play this together? And is it still okay if I call you Professor, even though you kind of got fired?
Hm... I love stuff like they play at parades! Big music with lots of bands and brass and stuff! Yeah!
I'm not dumb. You don't need to rub it in, Ini. Unless you want to rub yourself.
But you can't, can you, Ini? Ha! Who's the dumb one now!? It's Ini! Duh!
Kyu, I think I kinda like this guy Andrew, but I think I also kinda like this girl Diana too. What am I supposed to do?
Hmm... besides, how would you even be bad at masturbation? Like, you only cum once?
I don't get why you're so embarrassed, Lotte, it's not like I haven't seen you naked before.
Oh… well, I’m good at working at things, but I think I’d rather focus on magic than boys or girls…
Hmmm…! Someone really brave and smart and really good with magic! I'd love to fall in love with someone like that!
O-ho! I see what Natsuki’s doing! And what she’s wearing! You’re pretty sneaky, Natsuki, so it’s lucky it makes you look even sweeter than a strawberry tart!
Oh that's a tough one... hm... I love pie, though... oh, and tarts.
Hmm… Just… Er… studying away here! Like a powerful sorceress! Yep! (He’s kinda a stereotypical hero, so I should… I wish I had guidance on this, Chariot!)
Y’know, Pit, I’m pretty great at cards. Er, at least some card games. Anyway, if you lose before me, how about you let me summon you to teach you how to play better?! It’s a challenge! Yep! Sure is!
You know, Pit, I think I’ve heard of an eggplant wizard, but I’m certainly seeing a different kind of eggplant right now…
Hey, you! Man with the wings! Did you mess up a transformation spell too? Don’t worry, I’m good at fixing those! C’mere!
Hm. I guess that makes sense. I like simple panties myself. I can always just use magic to transform them if I need a sexy pair.
You know, I've never heard of Mitakihara City, is that in Japan somewhere...?
Hey, Sayaka, we got so caught up in talking about witches and magical girls and spirits and magic that we didn't even get to talk about Japan!
We didn't really get to talk about Japan, Sayaka, but you look Japanese with that wild pubic hair. Whenever I go home, people always get way too personal about how I do mine.
Well... you definitely look Japanese, Sayaka! I went to school in Europe, so, I like to keep my hair down there more neat. It's cute that you just let it go wild, though!
Yeech. Anything but vodka. I’ve had enough potatoes to last a lifetime… oh! What’s this thing called a Shine Spark!? That! That!
Uhm. Like… in the butt, Sei? I don’t know… I think with enough magic or shapeshifting anything is possible… but does it really feel good? I don't wanna hurt...
Well, even if you aren't, this'll be fun! I always like to see new types of magic!
Oh… you tried that potion from the magic item cafe, didn’t you, Tsuyu! The one that gives you frog legs!
Aww, c'mon, Sheena, you know to round out the loss, you have to masturbate, don't you?
Hmm… Sucy said that there might be some cool magic here… Er… I’m kind of doubtful about that… But all the more reason to inspire the rest of you!
Hmm! Wait! Wait a second! Natsuki, you can’t have ~player~ and Pit! That’s not fair! I saw them at the same time you did! Since you got greedy, I’m going to seduce both of them!
Alright! Ready, set, and go!
This? Oh! This is the "Claimh Solais," or "Rod of Seven Stars." It lets me do really cool magic! I just call it the Shiny Rod, though.
Excuse me!? What did a witch ever do to you!?
Um… yeah, I guess that’s true. But like some people say: If you love what you do, you’ll never work a day in your life!
Well… there’s this boy… but there’s also this girl!
No! Not at all! I’ve worked super, super hard to accomplish my dreams!
N-no… we’re definitely not supposed tooooo…
What the heck!? I’m not slow!
I caaan...
Ouch. You’re kind of right to the point, aren’t you?
I like to do a lot of really active magic! Flashy stuff like Murowa for fireworks...
What, Atsuko Kagari? It’s kind of long… isn’t it?
Huh? Like my Shiny Chariot limited edition figurines?
Oh yeah! They’re some of my best friends! Lotte Jansson and Sucy Manbanvaran! Lotte’s here, but if you’re watching us from home, Sucy, hiiiiii! ...She’s probably not though.
Well, obviously, you should use magic to help others.
You think I’m a good shapeshifter? How’s your magic different?
Oh yeah! They’re some of my best friends! Lotte Jansson and Sucy Manbanvaran! Hiiiii if you two are watching this from home!
Awwh. Fiiine... hold on! I have a great idea for this!
Okay, let me show you something cool at least... Let's gooooo!
Oh, that might be it! ...Wait, is that the one where you're sexual twice a week, or the one where it's once every two weeks?
I’m Atsuko Kagari and I’m-- I LOST? ON THE FIRST HAND? Uwaaaagh!
Huh? Why's everyone looking at me?
I picked up this book on the way here. I figured I'd give it a look to see if there's any cool spells, y'know? Klaatu... verata... nicktu?
Oh, that might be it! ...Wait, is that the one where you're sexual twice a week, or the one where it's once every two weeks?
I’m Atsuko Kagari and I’m-- I LOST? ON THE FIRST HAND? Uwaaaagh!
Hey! What a second! The game’s barely even started yet!
Uwaaah! But I’m barely more dressed than anyone!
Oh, that might be it! ...Wait, is that the one where you're sexual twice a week, or the one where it's once every two weeks?
I’m Atsuko Kagari and I’m-- I LOST? ON THE FIRST HAND? Uwaaaagh!
Metamorphie faciesse!
Metamorphie vestesse! Hm. This feels a little familiar... Kind of like Chariot's outfit.
Metamorphie faciesse! Dreams do come true! But now, I'm coming after you!
Metamorphie vestesse! Oh, crap. Sorry Lotte.
Metamorphie faciesse! Er... Sorry, I thought Lotte was gonna lose...
…Well… if it’s for the show… yes! Once, Sucy and Lotte made me do it! Um. For them. Then with them…
I haven’t seen you use much of it tonight…
Er… well, being a traveling, performing witch certainly makes a lot of people happy, and I’d never give up on that!
The boy’s nice, and always super interested in my magic, but the other girl’s a witch, and she’s super good at it, but she can be kind of stuck up.
So mean! I just got a little lost along the way. Do you know how hard it is to prepare for a show like this one?!
I got up early and stayed up late practicing my magic-- hold this--
I-I’ve worked really hard to get where I am. Sure, I’m not always the best, but I always try really hard!
Oh, are yours the poseable kind? I always thought that sentai stuff was pretty cool!
Metamorphie faciesse! W-whoops! I-I meant transformation magic…
Er… can you actually use anything but Explosion anyway? My lightshows are very uplifting…
I-I um, er. I don’t mind questions from fans or stuff…
Um… Other people find it kind of weird, so I tend not to get to do stuff with it, but it’s always easy to look a certain way a partner might want me to look, I guess…
Metamorphie vestesse! Hey, wait a second... Ochako, is this your outfit? It's so... loose on me!
You know, Sucy might have fun here, right, Lotte, so many vict-- test subjects that aren’t me for once!

Lotte’s a great witch! She works super hard to make really cool magic items. She also writes porn, so I think she’d love this game! And Sucy does… um… well, mushroomy, Sucy things, I guess. This is what Lotte looks like!

Hi, Misato!
Oh no! How did a succubus get here?

Uh huh, yeah… I see…
Hmmm…!

Yay! And um! Don’t be so uncomfortable! You look-- I wasn’t gonna say cute! I was gonna say… uh… composed!
You’re really kinda like Lotte! She acts super shy and innocent but then you see her bookshelf and are like whoaaaaat?

Raven! I've heard you can do some crazy cool magic!

So... Beacon Academy isn't really a magical school...
Well, yeah, I think so.
Oh! That's so weird.

HA! Score one for Akko! One naked opponent, and um…

Yay! I’m happy to see someone else likes the same style. Like, it’s a game of strip poker, it’s kinda dumb not to expect to get naked, right?
